summary: Adds a new spell tome to the game that summons a very powerful Ancient Dragon.
descriptionHtml:
This spell is rather simple, it adds a spell tome that you can purchase occasionally from a Conjuration Magic Vendor. 


== Casting Info ==
-You will summon your dragon for 60 seconds (1 minute)
-Its a 5 second cast time, so try to fend for yourself while summoning it
-It costs a hefty 1200 magicka (650 with Novice Conjuration Perk) to summon [Might be fixed later on]
-When it disappears/Is killed, you absorb a dragon soul



Please, feel free to criticize me here or give me tips, I might take suggestions, but I\'m not good with the creation kit at all.
author: psychomanP33
